content: sts work in seed stitch pattern until piece measures 2 in 5 cm from co edge ending on round 1 set-up round k1 p1 k1 twice k90 pm k1 p1 5x pm k90 pm p1 k1 p1 kfb 200 sts body round 1 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m k to next m sl m p1 k1 5x sl m k to next m sl m k1 p1 k1 twice round 2 k1 p1 k1 twice sl m k to next m sl m k1 p1 5x sl m k to next m sl m p1 k1 p1 twice repeat above two rounds until piece measures 14 5 in 37 cm from co edge divide for front and back piece will be worked flat armhole shaping row 1 rs bobble 5 remove m k to next m sl m work 5 sts in pattern as established 95 sts detach the ln from the cable if using interchangeable needles and replace it with a stitch stopper and reattach that needle to another cable or transfer rem 100 sts for back to scrap yarn to be worked on later turn the needle just connected to the new cable is now your rn row 2 bobble 5 remove m p to end turn 90 sts detach the needle from the old cable if using interchangeable needles and replace it with a stitch stopper and reattach the needle to the new cable that was just used row 3 bobble 4 k to end turn 86 sts row 4 bobble 4 p to end turn 82 sts row 5 bobble 3 k to end turn 79 sts row 6 bobble 3 p33 pm p10 p to end turn 76 sts ©2022 julie peng p 4 left front v-neck shaping row 1 rs k to 2 sts before m k2tog sl m p1 k1 p1 twice 1 st decrease detach the ln from the cable if using interchangeable needles and replace it with a stitch stopper and reattach that needle to another cable or transfer rem sts for right front to scrap yarn to be worked on later turn the needle just connected to the new cable is now your rn row 2 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m p to end detach the needle from the old cable if using interchangeable needles and replace it with a stitch stopper and reattach the needle to the new cable that was just used repeat above two rounds until 18 sts rem ending on row 2 shoulder shaping row 1 rs k to 2 sts before m k2tog sl m p1 k1 p1 twice turn 1 st decrease row 2 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m p8 turn row 3 mds k to 2 sts before m k2tog sl m p1 k1 p1 twice turn 1 st decrease row 4 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m p4 turn row 5 repeat row 3 row 6 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m p to end p the double st
